    • Constructor Detail

      • Flower

        public Flower​(Garden garden,
              int row,
              int column)
        Create a new flower (row,column) in the garden garden. Every new flower is going to be alive in the following state.
        Parameters:
        garden - It is the garden where the flower is locate
        row - It is the position on the garden where the flower is locate
        column - It is the position on the garden where the flower is locate
